Subjects: Katherine of Alexandria, saint; Margaret, saint; Mary Magdalen, saint
_description: ‘De tribus Virginibus Katerina Margareta & Magdalena’ — four 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

CamJes56.First Lines:
[K]aterina with glorious margareteÞat be virgines and martires
                    both two…
CamJes56.Last Lines:
…By þe prayer of þees sayntes allIhesu haue marcye
                    when we vn to þe call
CamJes56.Attributed Title:
De tribus Virginibus Katerina Margareta & Magdalena (f.
                    76)

BLHar2255.First Lines:
Kateryne with glorious Margaretethat be virgines and martirs both
                    tweyne…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…Bi the prayeer of thes seyntis alleIhu haue mercy whan we to
                    the calle
BLHar2255.Attributed Title:
Incipit de tribus virginibus Katerine Margerite & Magdelene (f.
                    115, in rubric)
BLHar2255.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 134-5.
